featured.text: In other families, a surname is included in the selection of a child’s given name to 33 a family surname going.
The wide selection is a sure sign that in many consumers’ minds, digital cameras have risen from mere gadgets to must-have items.

definition.zh_def: 選擇，挑選的行為或過程。
definition.en_def: The act or process of choosing from a variety of options.
definition.example: The selection of the team members was based on their skills and experience.
